title: track_vacation
text:
library(shiny)
ui <- fillPage( titlePanel(“My Full Page Shiny App”), sidebarLayout( sidebarPanel(“Sidebar content”), mainPanel(“Main content”) ) )
server <- function(input, output, session) {}
shinyApp(ui, server)

title: About
text: This site helps you track the vacation of individuals in an interactive way. A place to visualize the vacations, country specific holidays, weekends and plan the project in an effective way.
